recipe.title: Creamy Cilantro Lime Dressing Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; fresh cilantro, finely chopped ; (10 g)
1 cup ; avocado oil, or olive oil ; (240 mL)

steps.step: Add cilantro, salt, pepper, coconut milk, lime juice and avocado oil into a mason jar and secure lid tightly.
Shake vigorously until ingredients are mixed thoroughly.
Store dressing in the fridge and use within 1-2 weeks. You may need to shake up the ingredients again before each use.
